Package de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.bigstep

Class de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.bigstep.BigStepComponent extends AbstractProofComponent implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 3793854335585017325L

Serialized Fields

treeNodeLayout

TreeNodeLayout treeNodeLayout
Handles the layouting of the BigStepNodeComponents to a tree.

index

int index
When checking all nodes within the tree, this index is used to count them top to bottom.

jumpNode

ProofNode jumpNode
Contains the ProofNode where to scroll.
When new nodes get inserted, the first of those nodes is assigned to the jumpNode. When the layout is changing (that is always happening when nodes get inserted) the BigStepComponent scrolls itself, so that the jumpNode is visible.

border

int border
The border around the BigStepComponent in pixels.
This are 20 pixels per default.

Class de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.bigstep.BigStepNodeComponent extends JComponent implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: -2050381804392542081L

Serialized Fields

proofModel

BigStepProofModel proofModel
The BigStepProofModel that will get used to apply the actions on.

proofNode

BigStepProofNode proofNode
The origin BigStepProofNode. Contains the information this node gives a graphics representation.

dimension

Dimension dimension
Contains the information of the size of the Component. When BigStepNodeComponent.placeElements(int) is called dimension is filled with proppert values.

spacing

int spacing
Amount of pixels that will be left free between the elements of the node.

indexLabel

JLabel indexLabel
Label that will contain the index at the front.

expression

CompoundExpression<S,E> expression
Component containing the expression and the store.

downArrowLabel

JLabel downArrowLabel
Label containing the down-directed double-arrow separating the Expression and the Resul-Expression.

resultExpression

CompoundExpression<S,E> resultExpression
Component containing the result-expression and the result-store.

ruleButton

MenuButton ruleButton
The Button with its DropDownMenu used to perform the userinteraction.

ruleLabel

JLabel ruleLabel
Label that will be used to show the evaluated rule.

menuTranslateItem

MenuTranslateItem menuTranslateItem
The "Translate to core syntax" item in the context menu.

translator

LanguageTranslator translator
The translator will be used to determine whether the expression contains syntactical sugar.

Package de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.components

Class de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.components.CompoundExpression extends JComponent implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: -7653329118052555176L

Serialized Fields

expressionRenderer

PrettyStringRenderer expressionRenderer
Renderer that is used to render the expression

expression

Expression expression
The current expression.

underlineExpression

Expression underlineExpression
The expression that will be underlined during the rendering.

expressionSize

Dimension expressionSize
The size of the expression.

environment

 environment
The current environment. If the environment is null no environment is rendered.

environmentRenderer

EnvironmentRenderer<S,E> environmentRenderer
Renderer that is used to render the environment.

environmentSize

Dimension environmentSize
The size of the environment.

braceSize

int braceSize
The width of the braces around the expression and the environment.

noLineWrapping

boolean noLineWrapping
Whether the expression should be wrapped if there is not enough space to render it in on line.
Actualy this is only used with the result of the BigStepGUI.

alternativeColor

Color alternativeColor
If this color is given all colors of the AbstractRenderer are ignored and only this color is used.

Class de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.smallstep.SmallStepNodeComponent extends JComponent implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 5536947349690384851L

Serialized Fields

proofNode

SmallStepProofNode proofNode
The origin SmallStepProofNode

proofModel

SmallStepProofModel proofModel
The SmallStepProofModel

rules

SmallStepRulesComponent rules
The SmallStepRulesComponent containing the Labels of already evaluated Rules and the MenuButton for Rules not yet evaluated.

ruleDimension

Dimension ruleDimension
The Dimension the rules needs to get drawn correctly.

actualRuleHeight

int actualRuleHeight
The actual height the rules should use. This is >= ruleDimension.height. This height is determined by the expression height of the child node.

expression

CompoundExpression<S,E> expression
The Compound expression that is used to display the expression.

expressionDimension

Dimension expressionDimension
The Dimension the expression needs to get drawn correctly.

actualExpressionHeight

int actualExpressionHeight
The actual height the expression should use. This is >= expressionDimension.height. This height is determined by the rule height of the parent node.

origin

Point origin
The top-left-most position where the entire node should located.

memoryEnabled

boolean memoryEnabled
Flags that contains whether the expression has memory.

spacing

int spacing
The free space in pixels that should be hold between the components

translateItem

MenuTranslateItem translateItem
Entry within the context menu. Need to hold this value because is value can change. This item is enabled/disable in the SmallStepNodeComponent.update()-Method.

See Also:
SmallStepNodeComponent.update()

translator

LanguageTranslator translator
Translator that is used to determine whether the expression contains syntactical sugar.

currentUnderlineExpression

Expression currentUnderlineExpression
The expression that should be underlined. When the user moves the mouse over a rule (not not grouped rules) or the MenuButton, that a part of the entire expressions needs to get underlined.

underlineRuleAdapter

MouseMotionAdapter underlineRuleAdapter
Adapter that is used to get added to every object that can cause the gui to underline an expression. It is bound to every SmallStepRuleLabel and to every MenuButton.

Class de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.smallstep.SmallStepRuleLabel extends JComponent implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 2850026835245921469L

Serialized Fields

ruleCount

int ruleCount
The exponent number

stepExpression

Expression stepExpression
The expression that may be associated with this rule.

This expression is used to determin the part of the current expression of the SmallStepNodeComponent that needs to get underlines.

The list of SmallStepRuleLabels containing the information of all rules that have been evaluated.

The MenuButton for the Rule(s) that have not yet been evaluated.

The spacing in pixels between the labels/menuButton itself and between the labales/menuButton and the arrow.

The size in pixels for the arrowhead.

After the layouting of the SmallStepComponent the size contains the actual size of this component.

Class de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.typechecker.TypeCheckerEnterType extends JComponent implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

panel

JPanel panel
The Panel where everything is layed out

textField

JTextField textField
The Textfield where the user is able to enter the type

label

JLabel label
Label that informs the user what to do: "Enter type: "

active

boolean active
The TypeCheckerNodeComponent can determine whether the TypeCheckerEnterType-GUI is active. It will need the information to do a propper layouting.

componentAdapter

ComponentAdapter componentAdapter
The ComponentAdapter that will be used to determine when the component gets shown. When the component gets shown a TypeCheckerEnterType.requestTextFocus() will be called.

Class de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.typechecker.TypeCheckerNodeComponent extends JComponent implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: -6671706090992083026L

Serialized Fields

proofModel

TypeCheckerProofModel proofModel
The Model this node can work with to guess, enter type or do Coresyntax transaltion

proofNode

TypeCheckerProofNode proofNode
The Origin TypeCheckerProofNode this node represents.

dimension

Dimension dimension
The calculated dimension for this node in pixels.

spacing

int spacing
The spacing that should be set free between to components within the node.

indexLabel

JLabel indexLabel
The label containing the (x) text at the beginning.

expression

CompoundExpression<S,E> expression
The CompoundExpression containing the expression of this node.

ruleButton

MenuButton ruleButton
The MenuButton the user can use to do the actions.

typeLabel

JLabel typeLabel
The JLabel showing the resulting type of this node, once the node has been evaluated.

ruleLabel

JLabel ruleLabel
The JLabel showing the information about the rule, once the rule has been evaluated.

typeEnter

TypeCheckerEnterType typeEnter
The TypeCheckerEnterType element that will be shown once the user select "Enter type" from the menu.

menuTranslateItem

MenuTranslateItem menuTranslateItem
The menuTranslate is one element within the menu.
Needs to get handled separatly because it can be enabled and disabled whether the expression is containing Syntactical Sugar.

translator

LanguageTranslator translator
The translator will be used to determin whether the expression contains syntactical sugor.
